document_data.mainbody:
The Scriveners Tale" is a short adventure module for 14&ndashlevel players, collected in the anthology Candlekeep Mysteries, where players are cursed by an archfey and must find a way to free themselves.
In 1492 DR, a group of adventurers in Candlekeep are accidentally exposed to The Scriveners Tale, a cursed tome that is supposed to be locked away. The adventurers are afflicted with a debilitating curse, courtesy of the Princess of the Shadow Glass, an archfey trapped inside the tome. The adventurers must travel to Baldurs Gate to track down the tomes previous owner, before confronting the Princess in the ruins of Delimbiyran.
